display_html:
data Chain block
  • = Genesis
  • | (Chain block) :> block
name: Chain :> Genesis

display_html: foldChain ∷ (a → b → a) → a → Chain b → a
name: foldChain

display_html:
class (StandardHash b, Typeable b) ⇒ HasHeader b where
  • getHeaderFields ∷ b → HeaderFields b
name: HasHeader getHeaderFields

display_html:
newtype Point block = Point {
  • getPoint ∷ WithOrigin (Block SlotNo (HeaderHash block))
}
name: Point Point getPoint

display_html:
data ChainUpdate block a
  • = AddBlock a
  • | RollBack (Point block)
name: ChainUpdate AddBlock RollBack

display_html: rollback ∷ HasHeader block ⇒ Point block → Chain block → Maybe (Chain block)
name: rollback

display_html: applyChainUpdate ∷ HasHeader block ⇒ ChainUpdate block block → Chain block → Maybe (Chain block)
name: applyChainUpdate

display_html: applyChainUpdates ∷ HasHeader block ⇒ [ChainUpdate block block] → Chain block → Maybe (Chain block)
name: applyChainUpdates

display_html: pointIsAfter ∷ HasHeader block ⇒ Point block → Point block → Chain block → Bool
name: pointIsAfter

display_html: isPrefixOf ∷ Eq block ⇒ Chain block → Chain block → Bool
name: isPrefixOf

display_html:
data Block = Block {
  • blockHeader ∷ BlockHeader
  • blockBody ∷ BlockBody
}
name: Block Block blockHeader blockBody

display_html:
data BlockHeader = BlockHeader {
  • headerHash ∷ HeaderHash BlockHeader
  • headerPrevHash ∷ ChainHash BlockHeader
  • headerSlot ∷ SlotNo
  • headerBlockNo ∷ BlockNo
  • headerBodyHash ∷ BodyHash
}
name: BlockHeader BlockHeader headerHash headerPrevHash headerSlot headerBlockNo headerBodyHash

display_html: fixupChain ∷ HasFullHeader b ⇒ (Anchor b → b → b) → [b] → Chain b
name: fixupChain

display_html: fixupAnchoredFragmentFrom ∷ HasFullHeader b ⇒ Anchor b → (Anchor b → b → b) → [b] → AnchoredFragment b
name: fixupAnchoredFragmentFrom

display_html:
data ChainProducerState block = ChainProducerState {
  • chainState ∷ Chain block
  • chainFollowers ∷ FollowerStates block
  • nextFollowerId ∷ FollowerId
}
name: ChainProducerState ChainProducerState nextFollowerId chainFollowers chainState

display_html:
data FollowerState block = FollowerState {
  • followerPoint ∷ Point block
  • followerNext ∷ FollowerNext
}
name: FollowerState FollowerState followerNext followerPoint

display_html: followerInstruction ∷ HasHeader block ⇒ FollowerId → ChainProducerState block → Maybe (ChainUpdate block block, ChainProducerState block)
name: followerInstruction

display_html: rollback ∷ (HasHeader block, HeaderHash block ~ HeaderHash block') ⇒ Point block' → ChainProducerState block → Maybe (ChainProducerState block)
name: rollback

display_html: applyChainUpdate ∷ (HasHeader block, HeaderHash block ~ HeaderHash block') ⇒ ChainUpdate block' block → ChainProducerState block → Maybe (ChainProducerState block)
name: applyChainUpdate

display_html: applyChainUpdates ∷ (HasHeader block, HeaderHash block ~ HeaderHash block') ⇒ [ChainUpdate block' block] → ChainProducerState block → Maybe (ChainProducerState block)
name: applyChainUpdates
